Feature.Name: Hidden Message
Feature.Text: A message is hidden somewhere on the item. It might be visible only at a certain time of the year, under the light of one phase of the moon, or in a specific location.

MagicProperty.Name: Property - Hidden Message
MagicProperty.Description: A message is hidden somewhere on the item. It might be visible only at a certain time of the year, under the light of one phase of the moon, or in a specific location.
